actionable_tasks.title: Complete MongoDB TTL Indexes
actionable_tasks.description: Finish implementing MongoDB TTL (Time-To-Live) indexes at 50% progress. These indexes automatically expire documents after a set time, optimizing storage for logs, sessions, or temporary data.
implementation_steps: Identify collections needing TTL (e.g., user sessions, API logs).
Add TTL indexes via MongoDB shell or Mongoose schema: db.collection.createIndex({ "createdAt": 1 }, { expireAfterSeconds: 3600 }).
Test expiration by inserting sample documents and verifying deletion after TTL.
Update package.json scripts to include index validation.

actionable_tasks.title: Expand Testing Coverage to 70%
actionable_tasks.description: Increase automated test coverage from ~45% to >70% target, focusing on MCP endpoints, provider health checks, and chat interface using Jest.
implementation_steps: Run coverage report: npm test -- --coverage.
Write 5-10 unit tests for untested functions in MCP servers and LLM failover.
Add integration tests for Spotify OAuth and chat success paths.
Configure Jest for >70% threshold in CI scripts.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Basic p50/p95 Metrics in Performance Monitoring

implementation_steps: Instrument key endpoints (e.g., /api/chat, /api/spotify) with timing middleware.
Collect percentiles using a simple array sort or library like 'percentile'.
Expose metrics endpoint and integrate with analytics dashboard.
Test with load simulation (e.g., artillery.io).
